name: klaus
text: This is the beginning of one of my favorite Achewood arcs ever. It got so dramatic and even serious!

name: catachresis
text: This is where Onstad's art starts to get really fucking good. Absolutely brilliant arc. I'm on an archive trawl, and I'm excited.

name: zem
text: Oh Philippe. How did you get into this situation.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Nice Pete is right. Try it sometime.

name: stuart
text:
Tap out 8 full seconds with your fingers and try just exhaling for the entire duration at audible volume.

As you can see, Nice Pete is a professional screamer.

name: gormster
text: A comment left by gormster was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wildcat, shadowlink_97, hellsfruition, mugi)

name: spinynorman
text: Is that going full-out blast at the top of your fucking lungs so that your face is red and your nose might bleed, or just singing an even A?

name: dorothypoopbot
text: Don't forget, this is while people in the McDonald's are going all crazy trying to get you out of there before you upset their bloated customers.

name: heccibiggs
text: Exhaling is different from making noise. It's harder to just breathe out audibly for a sustained period than it is to continually make a sound with your voice

name: ssddr
text: I like to walk around Wal-mart alone at 3 am reapeating Nice Pete's lines very loudly.

name: mrmacky
text: A comment left by mrmacky was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fakead, Taidje_Khan, Darthemed)

name: mattboy
text: Sadly, those people are trained to ignore you...

name: carlyle
text: Those people are fucking BORN to ignore you.

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, nighttoad, atom, Jesler729, mortshire)

name: tekende
text: Because you repeat a line directly from a comic on the same page as that comic?

name: rayonatoilet
text: Because he put that chicken head in that woman's box of Mcnuggets, obviously.

name: tinhand
text: It was just another afternoon in the life of Nice Pete

name: excusemesenator
text: This was the first Achewood strip I ever read. It made me laugh like the dickens.

name: _cheesekayke
text: I got so distraught when I first read this comic. I believe I had difficulty breathing.

name: serf
text: time for a trip to mickey d's

name: spinynorman
text:
For some reason when I'm bored at parties I will actually start talking like this.

I mean, the hell with all these people, I'm never gonna meet them again anyway.

name: dasilodavi
text: That IS a hard thing to do.

name: songbirdspectre
text: You people are all so talky.

name: rowboat
text: Nice Pete owns the Mystery Machine.

name: fineoakstructure
text: If by "owns" you mean " Corrected its previous operators," then yes.

name: subtlet
text: Didn't Phillipe's mother warn him about this type of situation?

name: dwade
text: One must wonder how many McDonalds Nice Pete is still actually allowed in...

name: tekende
text: Um, 0. He said he's not welcome in any of them.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: there are Notices about him in break rooms and under counters.

name: tekende
text: All with grainy security-cam photos

name: wilbur
text: Nice Pete is probably a fan of Chris Cunningham music videos.

name: drago25
text: chubby for that avatar

name: slab64
text: I assume you're referencing the Aphex Twin video for "Come to Daddy". Very apropos.

name: wilbur
text: Yeah, I like to think that Nice Pete's creation myth is very similar to that video.

name: l_c_b
text: That is a straight up serial killer van.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Looks like a Dodge. I had a white Ford van like that. Piece of junk except the motor was an unkillable beast.

name: snachicat
text:
It looks confused. Like the headlights are eyes going all opposite of cross-eyed.

I don't know I guess what I am trying to say here is that I think serial killers should drive vans that look less confused. I'm sorry.

name: drago25
text: Man the most I could ever pull off was six seconds

name: tttt2
text: Nice Pete was a workin' man

name: wilbur
text:
A sparkle was in his eye
And Philippe's life was in his hands.

name: jimbob
text: Early in the morning at the break of day, I think we all know what Nice Pete used to do.

name: canusdivinus
text: Sometimes the best response is just to scream and shake. Doesn't matter who you're talking to, you win that argument.

name: shineboxx
text: I like the van's face in the first panel.

name: ravigotte
text: Yeah, it sort-of looks "retarded", you know, all, eyes pointing outward in two different directions, stupid flat grin on its face

name: atticusonline
text: I can't help but wonder where he got that van since he drove his last one into a bunch of dental workers.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
*points to corner of room*

there are some of their hands.

name: radarjammer
text: Panel 3 happens to me way too often.

name: lutipold
text: Nice Pete breaks at least two driving guidelines in this strip.

name: straw
text: Haha, this was on my 21st birthday!

name: sex_bicycle
text: lol i went up to the top after i read this comment to check how old i would have been, and it was on my 17th birthday :D  you're exactly 4 years older then me :P you're nearly 27 oldie :P

name: sex_bicycle
text: awww dammit >.< i forgot those were american dates and not english that to me reads 11th of march but it's the 3 of november isn't it lol

name: njury
text:
I can put my legs behind my back, but I don't see how that helps during sex.

Especially since I'm male.

name: ravigotte
text: and don't like the freaky stuff

name: sevenslashfour
text: Nice Pete is one of those characters I feel kinda ashamed for enjoying so damn much, and this is a pretty clear example as to why .

name: stuntman
text: 5, 5, a thousand 5's, ten thousand 5's!
